name: The Mine
description: You will find a fascinating and frightening adventure through the old mine in Soviet Union, where you have to hide from enemies in order to survive and figure out what else hiding the old mine
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Dual-Core Processor @ 1.8 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Video Card with Shader Model 3.0 support and 512 Mb VRAM (AMD HD 4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Dual-Core Processor @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Video Card with Shader Model 3.0 support and 1 Gb VRAM Storage: 800 MB available space
